name: expense-tracker-fullstack
description: Secure expense tracker with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.health: curl -X GET http://localhost:3000/health || echo 'Server not running'
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && mkdir -p backend/logs backend/uploads/profiles backend/uploads/documents backend/uploads/exports backend/uploads/temp
